baseitmdsc.longdescription: This strapless cocktail dress shows off your shoulders and the ruched bodice enhances your gorgeous figure. Bright and elegant, this dress will make you the center of attention in any party.

Tonal backstitching outlines the jacket 's straight lapel. Trousers have a zip fly with hook-and-button closure and open back pockets.

Five interior pockets on the jacket provide a surprising amount of covert storage. Trousers have a button fly with hook-and-button closure and back button-closure pockets.

baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Gray denim canvas sneakers with side vents

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Classic, youthful jeans for everyday wear. Relaxed through the thigh with a straight leg. Comfort and style!

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Roomy and comfortable, these suit pants have a single-pleated front and button-down back pockets. Dry clean only.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These jeans look like the ones movie stars wear when they get caught on camera by paparazzi. With straight legs and just the right amount of distressing on the thighs. Buttoned fly.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Boot-cut, Western-style jeans with subtle whiskering for a unique look The pockets feature leather detail with brass embellishments. Low-rise.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Rugged and casual low rise jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These Hermitage Collection jeans go with everything and feel ultra-comfortable. Featuring traditional five-pocket styling and plain back pockets. Jeans you 'll want to wear every day.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Look great and stay warm in this modern take on the traditional pea coat. The removable top collar adds style and warmth. 100% wool with a silky lining. Cut shorter and roomier than the traditional pea coat, this coat is great for travel.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Made from the softest lamb leather, this chic jacket is great for both city streets and country strolls. Features inside and outside pockets, zip front, and back vent for added comfort.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Tortoise-shell-look buttons and buckle accent this stylish spring jacket. The shell is 100% worsted anti-wrinkle cotton, and the lining is 100% polyester.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This jacket is deceptively light despite the ultra-warm 100% wool exterior Features two upper slit pockets and two lower flap pockets. Looks great throughout the winter months, for work or casual wear.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Rugged and handsome, this fitted bomber is inspired by the rebel in all of us. Features a zipped front with snaps and soft cotton ribbed collar.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This single-breasted sport coat is versatile and smart. Made of a luxurious wool and cashmere blend, this blazer is soft and comfortable. Short enough to show off your favorite jeans.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Look sharp and stay warm in this chic 100% wool blazer. Extra large breast pockets and shoulder details add flair. The brushed bronze buttons complete the look.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Simple luxury. This ultra-comfortable sport coat is a remarkably soft wool/cashmere blend, with brushing to create a subtle nap. Looks great with a turtleneck or dress shirt.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Look chic and distinguished in this form-fitting, military-style jacket with buttoned exterior pockets. Made from 60% cotton, 40% wool, it is fully lined and machine washable.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A great casual jacket that you can wear to work or out on the town. Made from Italian leather and lined with printed silk. Features back side vents and hand warmer pockets.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Waist-length soft leather jacket with pockets

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This raw-edged fedora gives you a distinguished look. A great addition to your fall and winter ensemble. Wipe clean.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Find shelter from the sun in this lightweight hat. The chocolate canvas band adds contrast to the warm caramel straw. At just $29, it 's affordable style.

baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Rugged hat with a flexible custom fit

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Look suave with this extra-long length tie from Borsati. Made of 100% Italian silk, with diagonal stripes in citrus and orange hues. Dry clean only.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Wrinkle-free silk tie in eye-catching orange

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This top-quality tie makes a perfect gift for a lucky man in your life. Textured diagonal stripes give this tie a timeless, classic look. Made of 100% silk.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Diagonal stripes add pizzazz to this 100% silk tie

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Made from imported silk, this tie is classic and stylish. Patterned with squares and stripes. Dry clean only.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Gorgeous tie featuring squares and diagonal stripes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Subtle stripes in scarlet hues give this skinny tie its character. Makes a bold statement with any dark-colored suit.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: The skinny tie makes a comeback

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Show of your youthful daring with this bold and beautiful tie from Baril. Accented with diagonal dark brown stripes. Made of 100% Italian silk.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Dazzling blue tie in 100% silk

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This hand-pressed tie has barely discernable stripes that catch the light. This is a versatile tie that complements many different suits and shirts. Made of a silk-polyester blend.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: A sleek and sultry tie

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This classic Leo belt is made of soft, supple leather that feels comfortable all day long. Features an antiqued silver buckle. Just $44.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: A classic black belt for business wear

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Make of imported Italian leather, this belt has a modern appearance that shows you are a man on the cutting edge of fashion. Features a unique split plaque closure in brushed nickel.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: A modern-looking belt with clean lines

baseitmdsc.longdescription: You can 't go wrong with this classic belt make of supple tumbled leather. Features a rounded antiqued silver buckle. Perfect for any occasion.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: A "goes with everything" belt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This belt features two rows of edge stitching on full-grain Italian leather. Finished with an antiqued silver buckle.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Stylish belt for jeans or chinos

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Made of extra-soft glove leather, this belt offers true quality. The pewter plaque adds a stylish touch. Just the sort of impeccable style you expect from Borsati!
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: A wide casual belt with a stylish plaque

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Switch from a black belt to a brown belt with a simple twist of the brushed nickel buckle. This versatile belt goes with any outfit. Made of genuine leather.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: A twistable buckle gives you two belts in one

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Suitable for for both men and women, this denim-colored fedora hat is made of light wool and presents a professional style. Donning an iconic style, this fedora has an indented crown with a matching side feather. It can make a fashion statement in the winter.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Blue woollen fedora hat

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This sun hat sporting a ribbon with zebra stripes comes in an earthy tone. With a wide circular crown, the hat provides adequate protection from the summer sun. Made of 100% straw, this hat is functional as well as fancy.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Brown sun hat with zebra stripes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This stylish and sleek wide-brimmed hat is the epitome of elegance from the very first look. Dressy enough for a formal occasion, wear this hat for a church ceremony or at a wedding reception.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Wide-brimmed gray hat with satin headband

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A trendsetter for spring, this purple cloche is elegant yet fashionable for a fun picnic out in the sun. The white hemming on the band adds a starking contrast to the theme. Match it with your favorite dress for a svelte look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Purple cloche hat with headband and bow

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This raffia sun hat, in dichromatic hues, is your travel companion for those sunny holidays. Resilient to sun and rain, the raffia straw is the raw material used for this hat. Available in different styles and patterns, the raffia hat helps you stay cool in summer.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Raffia sun hat with broad cloth headband

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These classic black aviator sunglasses are known for its large, oval frames and dark gray lenses. Originally created for pilots, they are also known as 'pilot 's glasses '. The most basic of all glasses, these aviators can be worn for any occasion.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Metal-rimmed classic black aviator sunglasses

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These oval glasses feature purple gradient lenses on brown plastic frames. They are timeless and have been part of the everlasting fashionable items in the modern world. With a retro look, they are vintage style sunglasses.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Oval gradient glasses with brown plastic frames

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These rectangle sunglasses with pink patterned frames provide a youthful look. Suited for round faces, these glasses provide 100% UV protection. Wear it for an ultra glamorous appearance.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Rectangle sunglasses with pink patterned frames

baseitmdsc.longdescription: With large, square frames and tinted lenses, these sunglasses appear stylish. Following an 80s slit style, they are classic and designer. Being polarized, these glasses protect you from UV rays and extra glare.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Large, square sunglasses with frames in dual colors

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Sporty sunglasses with a metal clasp around the temples, these glasses can present a catty look. In an alternating pattern of orange and black hues, they are functional as well as fashionable.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Rectangular catty sunglasses

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These black-rimmed round sunglasses are your vintage oversized glasses with purple gradient lenses. The round frames set the look for the season. In sober black, these glasses can be matched with any outfit.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black-rimmed round sunglasses

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This chocolate-colored leather belt has a rough texture with a rectangular brass pin buckle at the end. The distressed detailing is understated and polished. Choose this belt with your outfit for a rugged yet stylish look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Chocolate-colored leather belt with rectangular brass buckle

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This brown leather belt with a patterned finish and a shiny buckle is for everyday wear with your jeans. Western-inspired, this belt feature feathered edges. Soft and durable, this belt can be a wardrobe essential.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Brown leather belt with a patterned finish and shiny buckle

baseitmdsc.longdescription: With a smooth texture and finish, this brown slim leather belt is great with your office pants. The downtown chic look displays a professional style. Made of genuine leather, the gilt-edged buckle add a bit of bling.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Brown slim leather belt with a smooth finish

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This smooth black leather belt looks swanky with its broad metal engraved buckle. The exquisite modern pattern on the buckle exudes sophistication. From a plain black theme, this belt is now a fashion accessory.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black leather belt with fancy metal clasp

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Elegant and stylish in navy blue, this belt has a metal buckle and is characterized by horizontal seams across the length of the belt. Nifty with a contrast-colored outfit, wear this belt to bring life into a dull wardrobe.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Blue leather belt with metal buckle

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A unique variation from the plain brown belt, this belt with chrome clasp is for the fashion-conscious. This belt follows a slim style and the scaly pattern lends a designer appearance.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Textured brown belt with chrome clasp

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This fashionable leather shoulder bag is large enough to do second duty as your tote bag. It has double leather straps embellished with metal hoops going across the body of the bag and a metal snap to adjust the length of the strap.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black leather bag with two shoulder straps

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A puffy white bag made of soft leather, this bag has short rounded straps for comfy grip and a zipper in the front for your cell phone and keys. The silver metal studs at the sides show off a modern, stylish look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: White bag with silver metal studs

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A shoulder bag in leopard print with short shiny black straps, this bag exemplifies the latest in vogue. This bag also has a longer strap for cross-body wear. A small brass lock secures the zip closure.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Leopard print cross-body bag

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A simple and chic black leather tote bag, this bag has a straight, sharp look, following a modern design. The stitching at the center gives a finished look to the bag with enough space to hold the basic things every woman requires.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Simple leather tote bag

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A strappy bag with metal hoops and buckles, the color variation lends depth and character to this red bag. The multiple seams crisscrossing across the bag and the showy strap with the metal ornament creates a stylish and fashionable look. Of soft leather make, this bag brings shimmer to your wardrobe.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Red shiny bag with metal buckles

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This square-shaped beige tote bag is color-coordinated with contrast brown straps and beading around the bag. For a fancier look, the ends of the straps, adorned with metal clasps, are fastened to black and white patterned leather patches.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Beige tote bag with contrast-colored straps

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This satchel bag in turquoise blue with flower motifs portrays a Hawaiian look and feel and is perfect for the beach on a bright sunny day. Adjust the shoulder straps to any length for convenient handling.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Hawaiian satchel bag in turquoise blue

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This white satchel leather bag with thin straps, has a broad covering flap concealing the different pockets on the bag and is patterned in white checks. The bag is further adorned with long leather tassels attached to golden rings for a flamboyant look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: White satchel leather bag with long tassels

baseitmdsc.longdescription: With a big, brown flower fastened to the center of the bag, this bag exudes vintage elegance. With a square slim frame and long shoulder straps, this bag is suitable for all excursions whether you take it to office for that extra designer element to your outfit or sling it across your shoulders on your regular shopping day.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Brown flowery leather bag

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This satchel bag displays a woven look with interlacing strands of brown and white threads. With an overlay of securely fastened leather straps in chocolate brown, this bag provides a refined and professional appearance.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Chocolate brown woven cloth satchel bag

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This red crocodile handbag is stylish and luxurious with tubular top handles and a zip closure. The compact size makes it suitable for any outing. This designer handbag with croc pattern is made of the best quality leather.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Red crocodile handbag

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This dual-toned bag is a combination of light and dark browns with a black dotted closing flap. The bag is made of soft leather and has a short leather handle fastened to metal rims. Match the bag with a dark-colored dress for a refined appearance.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Dual-toned bag

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This black clutch is sequined and shiny to denote ultimate luxury and indulgence. Desirable for a cocktail evening, this purse sports a titanium clasp and beading. With a drop-in chain strap and a satin lining inside, you are sure to be flooded with compliments.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black shiny and sequined clutch purse

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Attached to a beautiful handle with gold beadwork, this brown clutch is embroidered with sequins and motifs in a floral design. The warm earthy hue will match with all your outfits. Carry it for a special occasion and be noticed.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Brown embroidered clutch purse with beaded handle

baseitmdsc.longdescription: An iridescent butterfly of bright-colored plastic beads on a bed of blazing red sequins, this clutch is vibrant and flashy. Joined by a silver chain handle and clasp, this clutch can turn into the talk of the town.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Red sequined butterfly clutch purse with chain handle

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This silver clutch is compact for you to carry with your favorite evening dress. Silver sequins are threaded together to form the glitzy and glamorous pouch. The clutch looks showy and sophisticated and comes with a silver clasp and beading.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Silver shiny and sequined clutch purse

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This sparkling silver box clutch comes with two handles a short titanium handle and a long silver chain. Monocromatic and pale hued, this jazzy purse has a hardshell cover. It is a must-have in your evening wardrobe.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Sparkling silver box clutch with dual handles

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This modern take on a classic flats design makes this a perfect fit for any occasion. The decorative metal piece along with the frills adds to the style quotient. Subtle and chic, these leather flats are convenient and attractive.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Chic flats enhanced with a decorative metal piece

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Casual yet elegant these stylish flats can be teemed with anything from jeans to dresses. The soft, breathable fabric lining adds to the comfort and the decorative piece gives glamor to this everyday wear.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Fabric and leather flats with a decorative fabric piece

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Dainty and smart, this patent leather slip-on flat shoes will give a boost to your image. The tiny polka dots on the body and the contrast toe cap adds to the elegance while the jelly bow enhances your feminine side. The padded insole never tires your feet and the breathable lining keeps your feet fresh.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Elegant white and brown leather flats with a tiny jelly bow, contrast cap toe, and contrast lining

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A must for every wardrobe, these black synthetic flats go with any occasion and any dress or jeans. The decorative work on the vamp adds style to this classic design, while the soft insole and the low wedge heels give comfort to your feet.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Synthetic pumps with decorative work and low wedge heels

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Classic and elegant, these silver flats enhance the occasion and makes your dress even more attractive. The soft synthetic lining, cushioned insole, and the manmade sole adds to the comfort. Giving these flats a new dimension is the seam detailing.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Synthetic silver flats with seam detailing and pointed toe

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Elegant and chic, these brown stilettos with open-toe style adds style to your wardrobe. The soft leather lining and the leather sole adds to the comfort and keeps your feet fresh.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Embossed leather high-heeled pumps with platform

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Elegance oozes out of these pumps as they brighten up your evening. Team it up with a classy dress and the silver fabric detailing and the buckle will do the rest. The soft synthetic lining provides the comfort and the Peep toe design enhances the beauty of your feet.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Silver open-toe pumps with decorative buckle and fabric detailing

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These brown fabric stiletto pumps give a casual and smart look. Be it the office or a day out, the comfortable platform and the fabric lining keep your feet from aching. The open toe design keeps your feet fresh and the fabric detailing with the decorative bow at the vamp gives it class.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Fabric pumps with open toe and decorative bow

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Modern and elegant, these stiletto pumps can take over a party. The brown leather detailing adds style to the design and the black platform gives lift to your walk.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Brown stiletto pumps with leather detailing and black platform

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Sophisticated silver stiletto pumps with thick platform. The synthetic lining adds comfort and the cushioned insole along with the open toe design keeps your feet fresh. The tiny polka dots and the seam detailing add an additional dimension to this design.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Silver patent leather stiletto pumps with open toe and platform

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Simple and stylish, these brown leather boots can be teamed with skirts or leggings or jeans not just for looks, but for comfort too. The soft breathable leather lining and the padded insole pamper your feet, while the straight lines and the seam detailing add to the classy feel.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Brown leather ankle boots with laced front and seam detailing

baseitmdsc.longdescription: The clean lines and the gray finish give this ankle boot a fresh feel. The layering at the ankle and the snub toe add to the sophisticated look. Add to that the padded insole and the soft lining and these boots are a match made in heaven for your feet.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Gray ankle boot with layered look and stiletto

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Elegant microsuede mid-calf boots that can be slipped on and buckled up with minimum effort. The clean lines, platform, and stilettos enhance the classic silhouette. Comfort is provided with the padded insole and the soft lining.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Gray microsuede mid-calf boots with stilettos and modern buckle

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Simple, classic design elevated with seam detailing and decorative buckle. The snub toe and the heels give it an excellent silhouette. Team it with skirts or leggings to enhance the style quotient. The padded insole and the soft lining give your feet comfort.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Short black leather shoes with decorative buckle

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Mid-calf boots that can be slipped on and buckled up with minimum effort. The clean lines, platform, and stilettos enhance the classic silhouette. Elegant and comfortable, these boots have a soft microsuede upper, padded insole, and the soft lining.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Brown microsuede mid-calf boots with stilettos and modern buckle

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Clean lines and stilettos define this classic design. The silhouette is perfect and add miles to your legs. The slightly padded footbed and the soft lining keep your feet cosy. Dress up your feet with the stylish shaft and the almond toe.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black leather stiletto boots with almond toe

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These straight leg denim jeans are cool and casual for any of your outdoor activities. Created from rugged cotton twill textile and colored blue with indigo dye, the denim jeans is a timeless classic. With the comfort fit, they can be your live-in jeans.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Straight leg denim jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These formal black pants are straight cut to display a slim and sleek form. Being wrinkle-free and stretchable, they are easy to maintain for daily office wear. Along with a short-sleeved white shirt and a striped vest, these pants make an ensemble for a perfect workday.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Straight cut black formal pants

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These black skinny jeans are your typical Friday night outing wear. With fancy buttons in the front, they can be easily dressed up with high heels. Made from color denim, these jeans are the next best thing to blue denim jeans.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black skinny jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Wide-legged and low-rise, this pair of denim jeans fit tight around your hips and flare out from the knee downwards. Capable of rugged use, these jeans are durable and stay on forever in your wardrobe. These jeans have a stonewashed look portraying a dash of style and elan.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Wide-legged denim jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This classic blue skintight jeans is scrape washed for a faded effect. Made of stretch denim blend, these jeans appear extremely skinny and ruched at the ankles. The elastane component in the fabric enables the stretchable capacity in the jeans.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Scrape washed skinny jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Mid-rise and belted, these flared pants could be your fashionable office wear. In jet-black, these pants introduce a tummy trimming look. Paired with a formal white shirt, this outfit will be a suitable go for any formal occasion.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black flared formal pants

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Suitable for a casual Friday at the office or for an evening out, this pair of pants hugs your leg comfortably. You can match them with a casual top or a sweater for a more formal look. The pleats around the waistband and the loose fit make it ideal as part of an outfit for a relaxed lounge time with friends.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black tight pants

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These tall, gray mid-rise gabardines are sleek and professional for your regular office wear. The bootcut legs and styling adds to the curvy and fit look of the pants. Of soft and smooth fabric, these pants are comfortably wearable.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Gray gabardine trousers with bootcut leg

baseitmdsc.longdescription: The cuffs around the slightly flared bootcut leg helps a taller and leaner look. The warm and earthy tone of these trousers add a pleasing touch. Paired with a matching top, this outfit constitutes business casuals.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Brown checked trousers with cuffs

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These black formal pants can be your quintessential office pants. The straight cut presents a sleek and polished appearance. Pair it with a jacket and a shirt for a cutting-edge appearance.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Straight leg black formal pants

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This pair of slimming trousers is well-cut and form-fitting. These trousers are tapered to allow for a groomed look. Of cotton make, wear it with flats, boots, or stilettos for shopping or a cocktail evening.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Beige cotton trousers

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These black striped flared pants look great as part of a business suit. They present a stylish and modern look. The vertical stripes add to the height and will make you look taller.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black striped flared pants

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These straight leg stretch pants are smooth and durable. Flexible and in a slate gray with button closure and a zip fly, these pants can be worn with or without a belt. With a unique, taillored fit, these pants are fabulous for a leg-lengthening look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Straight leg slate gray stretch pants

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These soft corduroy pants show a slim silhouette with a casual style. The rugged style and the two front pockets keep it utilitarian. These pants also have loops at the waist for a matching belt.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Straight leg pale gray corduroy pants

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This narrow pair of pinstriped trousers display an elegant and stylish appearance. Slinky yet sophisticated, these pants are made of the lightest fabric and are general, all-purpose pants. The polyester blend material is longlasting and hard-wearing.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black pinstriped trousers

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This classic original skinny comes in denim blue. With a snug fit around the hip and legs, these jeans are for everyday use and can be teamed with any top or shirt. Created from rugged cotton twill textile and colored blue with indigo dye, the denim jeans is a timeless classic.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Classic blue skinny jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Smart and rugged looking, this denim mini skirt looks ready for anything. Adding to the outdoor look is the distressed front and the frayed hem. The gold hardware at the front pockets garner attention while the side slits and standard fit gives you free movement. The skirt also features belt loop waistband and zip fly with button closure.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Mini denim skirt with gold hardware and rugged look

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This mini skirt design features a flocked finish, fitted elastic waist, and a pull on style. The fine gathered pleats add charm and body to this fresh lightweight woven skirt.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Mini skirt with elastic waist and gathered pleats

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Young at heart, this simple black skirt with a smoked wide waistband has a pull on design. The gathering at the waist ensures that the fall of the pleats are well defined. Ending just above the knees, this skirt can be teamed with a dressy or a formal top.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black skirt with smoked waistband and pleats

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Simple, yet giving a strong statement, this solid gray flannel skirt is an essential for your work wardrobe. The slit at the back hem gives you room, while the back zipper closure provides ease to wear it.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Gray flannel skirt with straight lines

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Get ready to party in something comfortable and dressy. The seam detailing provided at the hem and at the pockets give definition to this smart skirt. This design also features standard fit, belt loop waistband, and zip fly with button closure.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Denim mini skirt with dressy feel and seam detailing

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Casual and dressy, this mini skirt can be teamed with boots to enhance the appeal. The layered look with the large checks add spunk to your wardrobe. The wide waistband with the pull on design is easy to wear and gives a bubbly look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Mini skirt with large checks and layering

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Ease your transition between office and dinner with this sophisticated black skirt. The rutched look boosts the style and enhances your figure. Providing a elegant silhouette are the straight lines and the smooth finish. The hidden back zipper with the hook and eye closure makes it easy to slip on, while the stretch fabric gives it a bodycon fit.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Rutched black skirt with hidden back zipper and hook and eye closure

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This elegant satin skirt is dressy and simple. The overlay at the front adds appeal to the silhouette and the thin waistband along with the slanted hemline add sophistication. The back zipper makes this skirt easy to slip on.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black satin skirt with twin overlay front and back zipper

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Elegant and chic, this gray pencil skirt is a pleasure to wear at work. Comfortable and fitted, this simple skirt has a slit at the back hem that makes it easy to move around in. This design with straight lines has a perfect silhouette and also features a back zipper closure.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Gray pencil skirt with straight lines and back zipper

baseitmdsc.longdescription: An essential addition to your wardrobe, this black pencil skirt can be worn to work or for an evening out. Well-tailored and fitted, this skirt provides a slim silhouette. The seam detailing adds appeal to the skirt and ease of wear is provided by the slit at the back hem along with the back zipper.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Fitted pencil skirt with seam detailing

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Chic and smart, this black mini skirt can be teamed with a dressy top. The hint of flare and slightly rutched sides add appeal to this skirt. Ease of wear is provided by the back zipper and the slit at the back hem. Show off your legs in this well-tailored and fitted skirt.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black mini skirt with a hint of flare

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Bright and cheerful, this orange mini skirt with a contrast black hem is sure to catch everyone 's eye. This design also features box pleats and button tab at the waist.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Mini skirt with box pleats and contrast hem

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This chic plaid mini skirt sits low on the waist and features a waistband with belt loops. The soft pleats that fall from the wide waistband gives the skirt a puffball look while the slant pockets provide convenience. The check design adds charm to this skirt.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Plaid mini skirt with low waist and belt loop waistband

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Smart and contemporary, this gray pencil skirt with seam detailing and wide ribbed waistband is great for office. The belt loops give definition and the straight lines provide a slim silhouette. This skirt also features a back zipper closure and slit at the back hem.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Gray pencil skirt featuring belt loop waistband

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Teamed with a dressy top, this smart faded denim skirt is both feminine and charming. The seam detailing that defines the hem and pockets garner attention while the back slit and standard fit gives you free movement. The skirt also features belt loop waistband and zip fly with button closure.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Faded denim mini skirt with belt loop waistband

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This slim fitting black knitted pullover with three-quarter sleeves exudes warmth and comfort. The stylish cable knit design has a touch of elegance. The ribbed hem grazing the thigh sets off a slender frame.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Knitted black turtle neck pullover

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A short cardigan in pastel pink, it has pockets at the front to keep your hands warm. Made of thin, lightweight material, the cardigan is soft on the skin and suitable for all seasons. Available in all sizes, this long-sleeved cardigan is a popular choice among women.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Short cardigan with full sleeves

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This perfect purple curve-hugging sweater with ruched sleeves is suitable for many occasions. The ruching at the sleeves create a buoyant look. Dress it up with a skirt for a formal occasion or pair it with jeans for a casual outing.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Purple short-sleeved sweater with ruched sleeves

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Paired with matching leggings, this high-neck sweater dress makes an interesting ensemble. Stylishly cut, this short-sleeved outfit accentuates your curves in the best possible way. Worn with a belt, this sweater can be the little black dress in your wardrobe.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black woollen short-sleeved sweater dress

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Spun in an intricate diamond-shaped pattern, this gray hip-length sweater is modern designer couture. Not only does this sweater keep you warm in style, but also lends a fashionable expression to your clothing. The half sleeves and the turtle neck make it ideal for layering under a winter jacket.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Gray turtle neck pullover

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This turtle neck in classic black is soft with ribbing on the sleeves and around the neck. This sweater is part of a time-honored tradition and continues to be a fad among women till date. Presenting a neat look, it will be a great layering essential for winter.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Classic black turtle neck pullover with three-quarter sleeve

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This off-the-shoulder thigh-length dress in pristine white has full-length sleeves. Spruce up your wardrobe with this attire for a snazzy and curvaceous appearance. You can match it with a pair of jeans or patterned leggings for different looks.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Knitted white long-sleeved sweater dress

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This light-as-air white top has a deep scoop necked design. Knitted in two unique patterns converging at the waist and sleeve ends, this full-sleeved top indicates a taller and leaner form. It is elegant and is a year-round choice.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Off-white long-sleeved designer top

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Short and black, this woollen sweater top can be worn over any top, tee or dress to make a fashion statement. Fastened with rounded black buttons and of thin wool blend, this top keeps you pleasant and comfortable on nippy fall days. The long tightfitting sleeves have a slimming effect.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Short black woollen sweater top

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This attractive and youthful sweater dress reflects the colors of the fall season. The colorblocked stripes in earthy tones portray an urbane and sophisticated appearance. With long sleeves and a turtle neck, this dress is formfitting and emphasizes the curves.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Multi-striped sweater dress

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A long sweater worn over one shoulder, it has subtle stripes providing a designer look. The loose comfortable fit and the three-quarter sleeve keep it fancy yet casual. Due to the relaxed shape and flexibility, this slipover can be used as a cover-up for the beach.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Gray off-the-shoulders sweater

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Turtle necked with bold colorblocked stripes, this sweater adds a teen touch to your wardrobe. Formfitting and stylish, it makes you feel young and great anywhere. For a formal occasion, pair it with a black formal skirt or trousers. For an informal setting, pair it with blue denim jeans.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Full-sleeved and turtle necked sweater with colorblocked stripes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This chic and modern sweater with lacy ruffles around the neck, when paired with a long pair of jeans, make a unique fashion statement. The lacy pattern is repeated on the front and along the long sleeves. Use a belt to further flatter your figure and show off a slender waist.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Full-sleeved white high-necked sweater

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This classic black sweater with elbow-length sleeves is a go-to choice any day. The low cut v-neckline is super flattering. Pair it with a white shirt to for a bold look in black and white.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Half-sleeved classic black sweater

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This deep v-necked short sweater top made of stretched cotton can be buttoned up for a more formal look. White in color, this sweater can be matched with contrast-colored top or dress for a fancy getup. Team it with a short dress with spagetti straps for a trendy look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Short white sweater top with short sleeves

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A simple sweater for any girl 's wardrobe, this turtle neck of cool cotton blend, adds a touch of feminine flair. Soft and light, it has long, fitting sleeves. A timeless classic, this pullover is available in all sizes.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Full-sleeved white turtle neck pullover

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This casual top in shocking pink is appealing to the eye and draws attention to itself. The dolman sleeves with ruching at the edges, render a slim appearance to the shoulders and arms. The bow at the neck enhances the boat neckline.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Casual top in shocking pink

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Sweet and smart, this white cotton blend shirt with point collar and bib with pintuck stitching is designed to make you feel ready for anything. A must for any wardrobe, this shirt features a button-through closure and cropped turn up sleeves. The pleats given for the bib add style to this shirt, while the tailored fit makes it a pleasure to wear.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: White casual shirt with bib and point collar

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This soft cotton and spandex blend top has a contrast-colored fitted bodice for extra comfort. The ruching at the waist and around the shoulders display a gathered look, which shows off a slendar form.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Brown ruched top with bodice

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This printed corset with sweetheart neckline and moulded cups is designed to look cute while being naughty. The fitted bodice and the seam detailing add style while the solid color hem defines the top.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Printed corset with sweetheart neckline

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Blue cotton shirt with point collar that fits in well in the office. Tailored to fit your body, this full sleeved shirt with wide cuffs and button-through front closure adds color to your day.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Blue cotton shirt with point collar

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Cool as they come, this pleasing pink top with cap sleeves and defined hemline is fashionable and smart. The boat neck adds style and panache to this fitted top. Comfort is provided by the polyester and spandex material.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Pink collarless top with cap sleeves

baseitmdsc.longdescription: V-necked printed top that brings out your stylish self. The contrast cuffs and rounded point collar adds chic definition while the print is smart and elegant. Pair this figure-hugging top with old style jeans for an informal look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Polyester printed top with contrast cuffs and collar

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Dressy and smart, this beige top provides chic appeal with the rich material. The feathery cap sleeves with the detailing add to the tailored look while the crew neck adds simplicity to the monochromatic theme.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Beige peasant top with feathery sleeves

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This loose-fitting shirt with large contrast checks and mandarin collar is comfortable beyond belief. The pleat detailing at the front and the gathering due to the waist tie add style to this casual wear. The loose and cropped sleeves and the curved hemline add to the feeling of comfort. The button-through front closure gives an open neck design.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Plaid shirt with waist tie and mandarin collar

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This polyester and spandex top with ribbed hemline adds to the charm in any occasion. Strappy and loose-fitting, this black printed georgette top is smart and sweet.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Strappy black georgette top

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Elegant and smart, this striped shirt has a point collar and long sleeves with matching wide satin cuffs. The patch button-through front fastening with lining defines the contemporary style. The feminine touch is provided by the tuck in the front along with the curved hemline.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Cotton shirt with pinstripes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This black and cream top in horizontal stripes and a straight boat neck is smart and trendy. The short umbrella sleeves give a casual yet stylish impression. Pair this lengthy top with a mini skirt to complete the look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Striped umbrella top with horizontal stripes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This tailored pure cotton shirt with black and white pinstripe design makes you feel eager to get to work. The button fastening through the front and the curved hemline give a feminine touch to the otherwise strict look. The long sleeves and the wide-buttoned cuffs also add to the attractive design.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black pinstriped top with long sleeves

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Draped V-neck top with semi-exposed long sleeves to give you an edge. Designed with a gathered neckline and longerline cut, you can carry off this black top for an evening out or at a party. The solid design and the bodycon fit will suit most body types and give you confidence.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black drape top with semi-exposed sleeves

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This printed georgette shirt with V-neck brings out the feminine charm. The flowery print is elegant while the surplice neckline and the straight hemline add to the style. The sash cinches the waist into a slim fit.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Floral georgette top with surplice neckline

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Adding color to your wardrobe is this red shirt with point collar and button-through front fastening. The pinstriped work in the front and the short puff sleeves with the gathered detailing and satin cuffs add charm.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Red shirt with pinstripe work in the front along with short puff sleeves

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This striped georgette top has a relaxed fit and is casual and comfortable for any occasion. Skimming gracefully over the body, the cowl neckline and the waist tie is stylish and fashionable. The vertical stripes lend an appearance of increased height.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Striped cowl neck top with vertical stripes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Durable jeans with a feminine flair! These comfortable Albini boot cut jeans will look so cute on her, with their ruffled cuffs and stylish pockets.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' boot-cut jeans with ruffled cuffs

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A classic pair of straight leg blue denim jeans for a young girl on the move. She can play tag, kick a soccer ball, or do a cartwheel in these jeans, made of cotton denim with a hint of spandex to make it easier to move about. Perfect for a young girl who likes to be active.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' premium denim straight leg jean

baseitmdsc.longdescription: How can a pair of jeans be so cute and so comfortable? These blue cotton denim jeans from Albini Tots have a relaxed, straight leg, fit for every day wear. She will love them!
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' straight leg jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Classic boot-cut denim jeans with five pockets, an elastic waistline, and a slight blee bottom shape. Made of prewashed cotton denim, these jeans have that comfortable feel that will make her want to wear them every day. At such low price, you might want to buy more than one pair!
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' elastic waist, boot-cut jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: With their low rise waist and skinny legs, these jeans exude style. Made of cotton denim with a touch of spandex, so these jeans have a bit of stretch to them. From Hermitage.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' low rise skinny jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Functional and pretty! She will be adorable in these gorgeous Albini jeans patterned with colorful hearts and flowers! With an elastic waist, these prewashed blue denim jeans feel soft and comfortable.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' boot-cut jeans with a pretty hearts & flowers graphic

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Perfect for the playground, these classic denim jeans from Hermitage feel comfortable and look stylish, too. These jeans sit just below the waist, for a comfortable fit.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' classic denim jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Pocketed sweat pants with an elasticized waist for the girl on the go. She can run, spin, jump and play all day long in these comfortable cotton and polyester pants
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' sweat pants with elasticized waist

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Stylish and comfortable, these pre-washed denim jeans from Versatil are sure to please. Made of durable cotton denim, these jeans have a straight leg cut.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' prewashed straight leg denim jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: She will speed down the playing field in these sporty and stylish shoes from Synergy. With a leather upper, nylon lining, and a rubber sole, these quality-made shoes will handle all the wear and tear of an active, athletic girl.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' performance athletic shoes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Pretty little ballet flats for a pretty little girl. She will love twirling about in these adorable ribboned shoes from Mayflower.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' ballet slippers with ribbon

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Shoes with pizzazz! Her personality will shine in these sparkling ballet flats with nylon lining and synthetic sole. From Emery.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' shiny ballet flats

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Smart and comfortable! These cute buckled Mary Jane shoes with faux leather upper and rubber soles, feel great and look even better.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' classic Mary Jane shoes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Check out these shiny strapped ballet slippers from Mayflower. An adorable little bow adds to their charm. Available in pink, for ages 6 to 24 months.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' strapped ballet slippers

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Who wants to walk when you can run in these! Combining style and function, these fabulous athletic shoes from Coolers will have her racing ahead of the crowd.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' running shoe

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These fantastic flats from Synergy, with their sneaker-like appearance, look and feel great. With a plaid pattern and pretty pink bow embellishment, these aren 't just any old flats. They have style!
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' sneaker-style flats

baseitmdsc.longdescription: For when little ladies need to dress up! These black patent leather Mary Jane flats are perfect for a special little girl on a special occasion. Available in sizes 2T to 5T.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' patent leather Mary Jane shoes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A shirt as pretty and sweet as she is! This flowered-print cotton shirt from Albini works well for everyday wear or for more special occasions.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' short sleeve cotton button-up shirt with pretty floral print

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Durable white cotton short-sleeve t-shirt. A cheerful bright balloon print adds charm and whimsy to this comfortable Gusso top.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' short sleeve balloons graphic t-shirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Casual cuteness that 's perfect for playtime. This soft and comfortable velour hoodie, with a zippered front and kangaroo pockets, allows kids to move and play in comfort and style.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' soft & comfortable velour hoodie

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Keep warm and look great, too! Versatil 's pretty polyester-cotton knit cardigan, with button-ip front, is sure to become a favorite. Holds its shape well.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls cotton/polyester cable knit cardigan

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Albini Tots offers this t-shirt with a dressy cotton trim. Th faux two-piece look provides a preppy flair for a young girl with a real sense of style. Has the comfort of a t-shirt, but with a cotton button-up blouse collar, sleeve cuffs, and bottom trim to dress up the look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' colorful t-shirt with collared cotton trim

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Stay fashionably warm in the chill of winter! This cotton-nylon blend sweater from Hermitage, with a stylish ruffled neck looks pretty and feels nice and cozy.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' long sleeve sweater with ruffled neckline

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Crisp and classic, with a feminine flair. Albini Tots offers this cute cotton long sleeve tunic that 's perfect for special occasions, or for little girls who like a dressy every day look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' long sleeve cotton tunic shirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Cute & spunky! She 'll stay warm and comfortable in this adorable cotton-wool blend sweater with cap-sleeves. Bright color and big buttons give this sweater a fashionable sense of style.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' button-up cap sleeve cable knit cardigan

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Warm and wonderful. She 'll look so cute in this cozy knit cardigan, with a stylish belted waist, available in a range of earth tones. This Hermitage sweater is made of a cotton-polyester blend.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' button-up cable knit cardigan with tie belt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: She 'll look fresh and pretty as Springtime! This pretty orange graphic t-shirt from Gusso Kidswear, with its flower graphic, is adorable and comfortable! Made of machine washable cotton, so it 's easy to care for.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls Spring Flowers graphic t-shirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Crisp and classic, with a feminine flair. Albini Tots offers this cute cotton tunic that 's perfect for special occasions, or for girls who like a dressed-up look every day.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' cotton sleeveless tunic shirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Practical and pretty. This high-quality casual t-shirt from Versatil is great for everyday wear. Made from comfortable and durable cotton jersey .
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' short sleeve comfortable t-shirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Warm comfort and a classic look. This fleece-lined, Multi-color hoodie from Gusso Kidswear will keep her cozy and warm, and looking sharp! Made of a cotton-polyester blend, the hoodie is durable and machine washable.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' plaid hoodie

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Check out this adorable cable knit zippered cardigan from Versatil. Made of soft cotton, so it doesn 't feel the least bit scratchy. Just want every girl needs to keep warm and cozy.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' cable knit zippered cardigan

baseitmdsc.longdescription: T-shirt with a pretty butterfly print that sparkles as brightly as her personality! This adorable t-shirt from Hermitage, offers comfort and style for the young fashion trend-setter. The t-shirt is made of 100% cotton.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' sparkly butterfly graphic t-shirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Cuddle up and stay warm in this comfortable hoodie with a cinch waist from Gusso Kidswear. Its soft cotton fleece lining and kangaroo pockets will let her get out and enjoy playing in the cool air, but still stay cozy and warm.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' belted fleece hoodie

baseitmdsc.longdescription: An adorable sleeveless dress perfect for a warm summer day. Made of 100% cotton, with a colorful polkadot pattern, this sundress feels great and looks stylish, too! Enclosed with zipper at back.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' polkadotted sundress

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A charming summer dress, made of 100% cotton. She will look pretty all dressed up in this Gusso Kidswear sundress with straps at the shoulder, ribboned waist, and flower embellishment!
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' pink sundress with flower embellishment

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Pretty as a princess! She 'll look so sweet in this beautiful mid-length white dress with a babydoll sihouette, capped sleeves, and rossette embellishments.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' dress with rossettes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Stylish and totally charming for the fashion-forward girl. This Hermitage sleeveless dress in classic black and white will look fabulous on her! Pretty pink ribbon at the waist adds just the right touch.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' black & white polkadot dress with pink ribbon

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Casual and comfortable, this above the knee denim overall dress from Gusso Kidswear looks and feels great. Large pockets and metal clasps give this dress a bit of flair.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' denim overall dress with large pockets

baseitmdsc.longdescription: So sweet! This adorable skirt with a playful polkadot skirt is perfect for everyday wear and is made of an easy-to-care-for polyester fabric.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' skirt with small polkadots

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This delightful toddler dress from the Versatil Spring Collection is perfect for playing in the sunshine and picking flowers! She will look so cute!
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' toddler summer dress

baseitmdsc.longdescription: With an adorable ruffled hem, your little cowgirl will look precious in this Western-style jean skirt from Gusso. Made of prewashed denim, so it feels soft and comfortable.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' Western style jean skirt with ruffled hem

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Delightful cotton toddler dress, with white bib top and pleated blue and white striped skirt. Flower embellishment adds to the charm, while the buttery soft brushed cotton will this dress her favortite.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' striped dress with flower

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Pretty pleated mid-length striped skirt from Albini, with floral trim and comfortable elasticised waist. Perfect for any occassion, she 'll love dressing up in this!
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' striped and floral skirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This pleated above the knee skirt from Versatil, made with a wrinkle-resistent polyester-rayon blend, is pretty and practical. The elastic waist band makes the skirt comfortable to move around in.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' pleated skirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: With its tiered shape, this Albini casual skirt has a pretty, feminine charm that is positively adorable. The pre-washed denim is easy to clean and stands up well to wear.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' tiered denim skirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: She 'll be all set for school in this classic Albini denim overall dress. Colorful shoulder straps and metal clasps make this a stylish and practical choice that is easy to accesserize.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' denim overall dress with large pockets

baseitmdsc.longdescription: With delicate lace around the neckline, this Hermitage dress has just the right touch of femininity for those special occassions. The sheer polyester outer layer is lined with 100% cotton, so it feels soft and comfortable.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' lacy dress

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Tartan with a twist! A layered tulle underskirt gives this tartan skirt a full look that is absolutely adorable. A smart look for a smart girl! Zipper at back.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' pleated tartan skirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Smart, practical wrap-around skirt, with pleats at the back and a classic A-line shape. An elastic band waist makes this skirt a comfortable choice for everyday wear.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Girls ' A-line wrap-around skirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Let your boy light up the room with this half-zip sweater of sunny colorblocked stripes. The ribbing at the cuffs and the hem emphasizes the bright spirits. The mockneck will keep him warm and cozy.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Half-zip sweater with sunny colorblocked stripes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This khakhi green shirt has front pockets and hemmed sleeves. In true sportsman style, this shirt has a brown shoulder panel with same brown repeated in a patch over the left pocket with gold stars embossed. Made of thin cotton blend, this shirt is suitable for the summer season.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Green khaki shirt with front pockets

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This vibrant red and purple t-shirt displays a contrast in colours for a cool and spunky look. It has a ribbed collar and a two-button placket. The ribbed armbands at the short sleeves, which sets off the color contrasts, is eye-catching.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Dual-toned t-shirt with purple shoulders

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This striped t-shirt in asparagus green with a ribbed crew neck has a loose comfort fit. The long sleeves make it suitable for layering in winters. Soothing to the eye, pair it with beige pants for a warm pleasing appearance.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Green striped t-shirt with long sleeves

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This classic blue t-shirt for toddlers is comfortable homewear for them to play around in. The short sleeves and the soft, mediumweight cotton material makes it ideal for summer. The t-shirt is tag-free for added comfort.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Classic blue t-shirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This blue t-shirt with contrast stripes in lighter blue and pink looks cute and dandy on a young one. Made of thin polyester blend, this t-shirt can endure a lot of wear and tear. Pair it with jeans for a color-coordinated picture.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Bright blue striped t-shirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: With a crew neck and ribbing at the cuff and hem, this brown striped pullover is perfect for those nippy fall days. Looking natural in earthy tones, the brown hues match with pants of any color to create a coordinated outfit.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Brown striped pullover

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This cutesy woollen baby vest in navy blue is an adorable top for toddler boys. This vest is cable knit and follows the styling similar to adult vests. Team it with a shirt, jeans and tie and your baby will steal the limelight.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Woollen baby vest in navy blue

baseitmdsc.longdescription: The layered look of this t-shirt comes from extended sleeves and collar in a blue and white checks. The t-shirt has a two-button placket front. A popular trend in tween fashion, this t-shirt is suitable even for younger ages.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Blue layered t-shirt with full sleeves

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This soft brown t-shirt with multi-colored stripes look charming on little boys. The thin stretchable and wrinkle-proof material has good wear and tear. The round neck and the full sleeves protect from unexpected gusts of wind.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Brown striped t-shirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A signature style in plaid and of cotton twill blend, this blue checks shirt has long sleeves with barrel cuffs and buttoned front pockets. With a shirttail hem and a box-pleated back, this shirt is a must have. The loose and comfortable fit makes it suitable for winter.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Blue plaid shirt with long sleeves

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This half-zip sweater in flashy orange is tweed knit and thermally insulated to keep warm in colder temperatures. With a mockneck and a brass zip, this sweater displays ribbing around the neck, cuffs, and the hem. Pair it with khaki pants for an eclectic combination.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Orange half-zip sweater

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This white cotton shirt features pale gray background stripes with a modern geometric pattern. The gray and black colors in the pattern stand out elegantly against the white backdrop. Appearing cool and fashionable on a little one, this shirt is summery and cozy for all occasions.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: White striped cotton shirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A long-sleeved t-shirt in bold stripes of orange and black, it is bright and trendy. The black around the round neck adds definition to the stripes. Simple yet charming, this t-shirt is practical and comfortable.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Orange and black striped t-shirt with long sleeves

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Chic and classy, this elegant shirt in small checks makes your young man look stylish. This pocketless shirt has a bias button panel. Shirttail hem and barrel cuffs further adorn the shirt.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Classic checkered fitting shirt

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A layered t-shirt in multi-colored stripes, the long white sleeves impart the layering look. The contrast-colored stripes presents a merry and pleasant appearance. The two-button placket collar and sleeves help cover from the wind and cold.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Striped and layered t-shirt with multi-colored stripes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A regular pair of jeans for your boy in dark blue, they are straight legged and have a distressed finish. Whisker washed for a faded effect, the comfortable fit makes him look tall and lean. A white shirt goes very well with these jeans.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Straight leg denim jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These black bootcut jeans have a sheen due to the enzyme wash. Suitable for any occasion, they can be worn with a formal shirt or a t-shirt. Made of premium denim, these jeans last forever.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black bootcut jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These carpenter style jeans for kiddie boys are loose around the legs and convenient to put on. They have a stonewashed look providing a fashionable appearance. They make ideal play pants.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Blue carpenter jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This pair of flared denim jeans in blue have a sandblasted finish with a bootcut leg. The designer patch at the leg and near the pocket make up a trendy appearance. The pronounced side seams further add to the effect.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Flared denim jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Another version of the vintage style jeans, these are stone washed with an emphasis around the knees. They are essential in a boy 's wardrobe as they can withstand wear and tear and last a long time.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Blue straight leg jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These carpenter jeans with a side pocket are roomy and comfortable. Made of durable soft cotton denim, the seams halfway down the leg add to the dashing look.Match them with a fashionable t-shirt and see your boy become popular.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Carpenter jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Classic and stylish in navy blue, these are loose-fitting jeans with distinct contrast-colored seams on the legs. They are wide-legged to allow for easy pull-on. Good for fall, team them with a full-sleeved crew neck t-shirt.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Classic wide-legged jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These stretchable, soft pair of pants made of cotton spandex blend, are ideal baby pants. They are machine washable with an elastic waistband and a dark gray lining down the length for a stylish look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Gray fleece pants

baseitmdsc.longdescription: A rugged torn pair of jeans for the tough boys, these will look extremely cute on your tiny tot. The tears and creases on the jeans appear natural and cool. Match them with a belt and a sleeveless t-shirt to complete the rough look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Blue torn jeans

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Which boy wouldn 't love black canvas shoes? The greatest of all sports shoes, these trainers are hardwearing and lasts a long time. The black and white combination gives an elegant look.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Black canvas shoes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Appropriate for any casual occasion, these brown shoes will let your boy walk in style. With a felt upper and a printed checks layering inside, these shoes have matching shoe laces.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Brown casual shoes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Make other parents take a second look with these denim shoes for your toddler. With blue laces keeping the toddler feet snug, these shoes are a fashion statement on their little feet.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Denim toddler shoes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: With a canvas upper and a vulcanised sole, these classic shoes are stylish and popular. Suitable for all seasons, wear these sneakers with a pair of jeans and a tee for a chic and trendy appearance.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Blue canvas shoes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: As bright as your baby boy and as sunny as his disposition is the color of these leather shoes for him. The velcro easy fasteners lets him wear his shoes all by himself. The firm rubber sole keeps him from falling while he is running around.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Orange baby shoes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: These formal leather shoes in classic maroon makes a man out of your little boy. Stylish and chic, they are easy to slip on and have a soft insole for cushioning the feet.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Formal leather shoes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Start early with these baby canvas shoes in which your toddler learns to run and play. The cute little shoe laces are adorable in this tiny version. The red stripe around the base adds attractive color to the theme.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Baby canvas shoes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Perfect for those naughty ones, these army green sneakers go well with nature and adventure when the little guy is exploring his surroundings. Made of suede and leather, these shoes provide good traction, fleece cushioning inside and velcro fasteners for easy put-on.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Baby brown leather shoes

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This widescreen LCD monitor provides all the functionality that any power user would require from their display. It supports a number of inputs, including VGA, DVI, and HDMI ports, for maximum flexibility. Its native resolution is 1920 x 1080.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: A monitor capable of high-definition resolutions with rich colors and contrast.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This printer is perfect for printing those important essays, or personal invoices. It's small enough to fit on your desk, yet functional and reliable enough to use everyday.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: A capable printer suitable for everyday use.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: This wireless access point frees you from wires when using your laptop or smart phone in your house. Enjoy the flexibility of your fast home Internet connection, on your mobile devices. The wireless access point supports 802.11b/g/n standards, and can operate up to 150 Mbps.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Fast Financing provides an inside look on the personal finance industry, including up and coming growth sectors for your capital. Find investing tips, best practices for investment, and retirement planning tips in Fast Financing.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Get an inside look on the personal finance industry.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Maximizing the power of statistics to earn you money, Investing Interests brings you the latest financial trends before the rest of the market finds out. Find articles on ethical investing, environmental investment opportunities, and money management tips that fit your lifestyle.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: The latest financial trends explained.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Fresh voices and perspectives on maximizing investments in a digital world speak directly to you. Find articles on custom investment demographics and ways to make your money work smarter for you, so that you don't have to.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: A fresh perspective on modern investing.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Money Management has been the authority on personal finance since 1957. Offering unrivaled insight into business and economic news while providing the background information that successful investors crave, Money Management is the only financial magazine you'll ever need.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Get back on track to financial independence.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Over 3.2 million readers take advantage of the insight and financial advice Smart Investing provides every year. Showcasing market trends and emerging opportunities as well as tried and true investment principles of the most successful businesses in America.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: The only financial analysis you need.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: For the entrepreneur and the investor, Econo Sense provides in depth articles on financial matters that impact you. With editorials from some of the leading financial analysts on Wall Street, all perspectives are covered. Get Econo Sense working for you today.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: America's number one economics magazine.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Claudet magazine is a definitive resource on fashion and lifestyle advice. Every issue includes the latest celebrity gossip and fashion trend previews. Additionally, each month features music reviews, entertaining advice and shopping tips. First published in 2001.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Style and lifestyle advice for the modern woman.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: It's not just about food, it's about great food. The best dining out and the greatest recipes and party ideas. The hottest new chefs, the seasons best new wines and more. It's not just about food, it's about the lifestyle of great food.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Recipes, dinner party tips and restaurant reviews for the food fanatic.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Photoritz is the photographer's complete resource for improving their skills. Every issue is filled with photography lessons and tips, reviews of the latest cameras and gear and the best new photos for inspiration. First published in 1962.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: The newest cameras, the best tips and the latest photography news.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Society Time is your source for the latest news and stories that interest you, the sophisticated urbanite. Discover new restaurants, perspective on topical current events and our award winning investigative journalism. First published in 1983.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Lifestyles of the urban sophisticate.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Archaeo features profiles of the leading international designers and architects, the most ambitious and outrageous construction projects around the world and home designs of your dreams. First published in 1954.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Architecture and design for today's fast paced world.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Sportfit is a sports and fitness magazine that lives and breathes a healthy athletic lifestyle. Featuring sports reporting on professional and amateur sports as well as an intense focus on health and fitness. Each month profiles an up and coming athlete, no holds barred sports commentary and new workouts to add to your routine. First published in 1988.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Sports, fitness and attitude. The best workouts and sport commentary.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Digiglee covers the digital heartbeat of the consumer electronics industry. All the latest tech and gadgets are reviewed, profiled and discussed in an easy to understand way. Digiglees reporters aren't afraid to tell you what is great, and what isn't! First published in 1997.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: The latest in gadgets, electronics and software.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Wedding Luxe is your guide to planning the perfect wedding. Follow the latest trends in bridal parties, dresses and floral arrangements with our signature offbeat writing. Each month features a celebrity's wedding and tips to get the most out of your special day. First published in 1794.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Everything you need to know for your dream wedding.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: Natura is an escape from the everyday. Featuring the best nature getaways, the latest tips on a healthy vegetarian diet and yoga exercises. Be at one with nature and your body. First published in 1969.
baseitmdsc.shortdescription: Escape outside to find tranquility and better health.
